Pattern.Name: scanId
Pattern.Title: Scan ID(s)
Pattern.ShortDescription: Provide one of more WISE scan identifier(s) separated by space or comma: 00712a, 01432a, 05693b. Together with an in-scan frame number, scan ID uniquely identifies a single epoch WISE image set.
Pattern.ErrorDescription: Scan ID or comma separated list of IDs is required! Valid Scan ID format is SSSSSx(x can be a, b, c, d, e).
